about_the_game:
GamePlay

Enjoy the story while completing the puzzles.
Connect lines according to the numbers on the squares until all spaces are completed.
After completing the puzzle, you will get a diary of the protagonist's experience.
Collect all diaries to experience the complete story.

Story Background

There exists a wonderland inhabited by bunny girls! This pure world can only be entered through a certain "bunny hole".
Only virgins with very pure hearts will be able to find a way inside and meet the bunny girls that live there!
One day, you awake to find yourself in this magical land...
What will happen there?

Characters

Usagi:

The bunny girl who invites you to the rabbit country has snow-white hair and ears just like a real bunny.

Momoka:

The second bunny girl who comes to receive you has a strong desire, as hot as her pink hair.
It looks like you'll be squeezed dry by her if you're not careful

Hana:

A bunny girl with high power in the bunny kingdom. It seems that all bunny girls obey her orders.
However, her strong desire cannot be satisfied by anyone, can you?

Features

  • An imaginary fantasy erotic story with heroines who have unique personalities.
  • 20 sexy erotic CGs of heroines.
  • Skip puzzles whenever you want. (Press Enter at puzzle).
  • CG appreciation mode. (Click the CG next to it after completing the puzzle)

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains a large amount of extremely sexual content.
It may not be appropriate for all audiences.
Please make your own judgment before playing the game whether you meet the requirements for playing such games.
The story is purely fictional.
All characters appearing in this game are adults over 18 years old.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or higher; SteamOS
  • Processor: 4GHz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or higher; SteamOS
  • Processor: 4GHz+
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
